name: perilla

one of a group of Asian herbs used in cooking. One type of perilla is also used in traditional medicine: Mix the cucumber, perilla, mint, and lettuce. Slice the vegetables and perilla leaves. perilla seed oil
More examplesFewer examplesThey use Asian herbs and leaves such as Thai basil, perilla, and coriander.Shiso, also known as perilla, is a leaf in the mint family.The Japanese often eat perilla cut into thin strips in salads, and in meat and fish dishes.The fried chicken was wrapped in perilla leaves and drizzled with red pepper sauce.
